name: Gunslingin Joe
description:
Project JOE

  • By Parven, Darkzy, BartolomeusWK
  • Assisted by: Kiraid, Jeeshua
  • Coders & Bug Fixers - Parven, Darkzy, Kiraid 
  • Concept Brainstorm Team - Parven, Darkzy, Jeeshua, BartolomeusWK 
  • Artists - BartolomeusWK & Jeeshua
  • Music Composer- Cody Hodge ( Honourable Mention )
MECHANICS - GAMEPLAY
  • Gunslingin Joe will be the main character controller for gameplay. At the start of a game, the player will have to face flying enemies that are attacking the turret. By progressing through the game the player will gather highscores of how much flying enemies they’ve fended off.
  • Gunslingin Joe is packed with movement controls, he can shoot, he can jump he can dash and he can double jump. 
  • Joe will be able to be equipped with 10 different animations sets when we’ve polished the game, for our MVP we’ll only have him jump and walk.

CONTROLS

  • WASD - to walk
  • Space - to jump
  • Mouse  - to shoot
LORE

Gunslinger Joe is a bounty hunter from a JRPG. He got magically transported to another world and found himself defending an outpost where it seems like there is no signs of life, the tower had a strange aura. Some might even say, it has a magnetic attraction to anything that’s flying.

CHARACTER Gunslingin’ Joe
  • Main protagonist and best friends with Zell of the Final F. Series.
  • He’s got a shotgun, and he likes to use it.
  • He’s built for combat, Gunslingin Joe wastes no time.
  • Guy in his 20s
Dashing Gunslinger

Meatball Cyclops Monster
